name: Chuck Liddell Quiz | Sports Other | 10 Questions

questions.text: Chuck Liddell made his debut at which UFC event?
options: UFC 18 The Road To The Heavyweight Title
questions.explanation:
﻿UFC 17 Redemption.

	Chuck Liddell beat Mexican Noe Hernandez by unanimous decision. This fight took place May 15, 1998.

questions.text: Chuck Liddell was famously asked to step aside at UFC 40 so that which fighter could fight Tito Ortiz for the title?
questions.explanation:
Ken Shamrock.

	Tito vs Ken's fight produced the biggest UFC pay per view buys up to that point. The feud had started at UFC 19 when Tito beat Guy Mezger, and after the fight, Ortiz put on a shirt that said "Gay Mezger is my "*****", and gave the middle finger to Ken Shamrock who was in Mezger's corner.

questions.text: Who did Chuck Liddell fight in the quarterfinal of the Pride Middleweight Grand Prix?
questions.explanation:
Alistair Overeem.

	Chuck Liddell beat Alistair Overeem by knockout at 3:09 of the first round at Pride Total Elimination 2003.

questions.text: Who did Liddell fight in his first defense of the light heavyweight championship?
questions.explanation:
Jeremy Horn.

	Chuck's first defense was at UFC 54 Boiling Point against Jeremy Horn, who he defeated by corner stoppage in round four.

questions.text: Liddell's longest winning streak in his mixed martial arts career was how many fights?
questions.explanation:
10 matches.

	Chuck Liddell's longest win streak was 10 wins between March 31, 1999, and June 6, 2003, when he finally lost to Randy Couture at UFC 43.

questions.text: Chuck Liddell's quickest victory was against which fighter?
questions.explanation:
Renato Sobral.

	Liddell beat Renato Sobral at 1:35 of the first round at UFC 62 by knockout.

questions.text: Liddell's first professional fight was won by submission via which hold?
questions.explanation:
Rear Naked Choke.

	Chuck beat Noe Hernandez by a rear naked choke at 3:10 of the first round at NG 11, Neutral Grounds 11, March 31, 1999.

questions.text: At which UFC event did Chuck win the UFC Light Heavyweight Championship?
questions.explanation:
UFC 52.

	It was at UFC 52, Couture vs Liddell II where Chuck won by knockout at 2:06 of the first round.

questions.text: Liddell became Sherdog's Fighter of the Year in which year?
questions.explanation:
2006.

	Chuck won the award for his fights at UFC 57, 62, and 66. Liddell won all three fights by knockout.

questions.text: In which film did Chuck Liddell make his first acting appearance?
questions.explanation:
"The Postman Rings Always Twice".

	He appeared in the 1981 film "The Postman Always Rings Twice" as an uncredited boy scout.
